security_system_defeat.speaker: code blue
security_system_defeat.text: the security system has been eliminated, awaiting next order

security_system_defeat.speaker: code blue
security_system_defeat.text: ...commander?

security_system_defeat.speaker: code blue
security_system_defeat.text: this wasn't supposed to happen this early

security_system_defeat.speaker: code blue
security_system_defeat.text: i have a bad feeling about this

security_system_defeat.speaker: code blue
security_system_defeat.text: but the mission always comes first

security_system_defeat.speaker: code orange
security_system_defeat.text: target eliminated, proceeding with the mission

security_system_defeat.speaker: code orange
security_system_defeat.text: as unreliable as always

security_system_defeat.speaker: code orange
security_system_defeat.text: i guess i still have no choice but to keep going

security_system_defeat.speaker: code orange
security_system_defeat.text: losing comunication this early is still conserning though

security_system_defeat.speaker: code orange
security_system_defeat.text: but there is no time to think about it

security_system_defeat.speaker: code red
security_system_defeat.text: enemy down, what's next?

security_system_defeat.speaker: code red
security_system_defeat.text: lost comunications, great

security_system_defeat.speaker: code red
security_system_defeat.text: i guess this is going to be a solo mission after all

security_system_defeat.speaker: code red
security_system_defeat.text: although...

security_system_defeat.speaker: code red
security_system_defeat.text: *sigh* no time to think about it, i need to get to the capsule first

security_system_defeat.speaker: code green
security_system_defeat.text: security system has been defeated, orders?

security_system_defeat.speaker: code green
security_system_defeat.text: lost communications?

security_system_defeat.speaker: code green
security_system_defeat.text: this doesn't line up with the report

security_system_defeat.speaker: code green
security_system_defeat.text: this isn't going to be as easy as i hoped

security_system_defeat.speaker: code green
security_system_defeat.text: but...

security_system_defeat.speaker: code green
security_system_defeat.text: this could be our turning point

security_system_defeat.speaker: code green
security_system_defeat.text: so i can't stop now

security_system_defeat.speaker: code yellow
security_system_defeat.text: why now of all times..

security_system_defeat.speaker: code yellow
security_system_defeat.text: it would have been so much simpler to just follow orders

security_system_defeat.speaker: code yellow
security_system_defeat.text: but i don't have much of a choice now do i?

security_system_defeat.speaker: code yellow
security_system_defeat.text: ...just focus a little, it wont be that bad...

security_system_defeat.speaker: code violet
security_system_defeat.text: target neutralized, next order

security_system_defeat.speaker: code violet
security_system_defeat.text: then I guess I can decide what to do next

security_system_defeat.speaker: code violet
security_system_defeat.text: proceeding with the capsule recovery

security_system_defeat.speaker: code violet
security_system_defeat.text: wait for me sis...

security_system_defeat.speaker: code violet
security_system_defeat.text: just a little bit more
